name: TIKTOK INC.
sampleDescriptions: Discussions related to internet technology and learning-enabled content platforms.
Issues related to internet technology and learning-enabled content platforms.

Issues related to internet technology and learning-enabled content platforms; H.R.1153, the DATA Act; H.R.503, No TikTok on United States Devices Act; H.R.1081, ANTI-SOCIAL CCP Act; S.347, ANTI-SOCIAL CCP Act; S.85, No TikTok on United States Devices Act; H.R.7521, Protecting Americans from Foreign Adversary Controlled Applications Act.

Issues related to internet technology and learning-enabled content platforms; Protecting Americans from Foreign Adversary Controlled Applications Act (P.L.118-50) implementation; S.103/H.R.391, Extend the TikTok Deadline Act.
